name: Nitrojet
description:
Nitrojet is a chaotic metroidvania where everything is destructible. Run and rip your way through ancient ruins, cities, and caves, all while surviving dangerous airborne beasts. Use your tools and abilities to navigate the twisted lands, use your jetpack to soar through the skies, and burn your way through the ash.

It's a chaotic world. One wrong step and you'll be torn apart. Combat is high speed and frenzied, with threats ripping through all parts of the sky. Struggle against all the odds and claim your throne as the flame-borne god of destruction. Will you bring the world back from the brink, or will you rip it to shreds once and for all?

Key Features

  • Everything, from the ground, to the people, to the world itself, is destructible.
  • Use your tools to exploit and conquer every part of the environment.
  • Sleuth out many different solutions to each and every encounter.
  • Seize control of the bodies of enemies, using them to further your combat and exploation.
  • Map out and explore the vast ruins covering the isolated world's peak, discovering Nitrojet's 12 full areas.
  • Unlock and discover new abilities to help you burn your way through the world.
